name: Boros (itch)
description:
Trapped in the endless cycles of ouroboros, evil must be overcome to ascend. Accumulate your spirit energy while diminishing the energy of evil forces.

Everything but the snake graphic was made custom for the jam. The game was coded from scratch in Processing 3 / Java. PixelFlow library for fluid and bloom shaders.  The audio is all original except for the midi score used to render the background music, which is Pathetique by Beethoven.
